texts.biography: In a tribe of Pygmies or you inherit the leadership or you take. Wuor was not born to be a leader, but he was born good in a fight. 'Boss' and 'fighter' in the language of the Pygmies is the same word.
texts.name: Wuor

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Living Stones and Living Ruins by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 1 level.
specialty.name: Pygmy Chief
